data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off.
Jelle Vossen scores to make it 1-0 at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 41, Omar Govea (Zulte) has received a first yellow card.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Zulte have kicked-off the second half at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 46, Djihad Bizimana is replacing Jenthe Mertens for the away team.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's second substitution at Regenboogstadion with Alessandro Albanese replacing Stefan Milosevic.
An attacking Zulte player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 49, Goal! Gianni Bruno extends Zulte's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
Omar Govea puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Tom Reyners is replacing Brendan Schoonbaert for Waasland-Beveren at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Omar Govea with Bassem Srarfi.
Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a second substitution, with Cameron Humphreys replacing Daniel Opare.
Goal! Waasland-Beveren reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Daan Heymans.
In the minute 84, Ibrahima Seck (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Lothar D'Hondt.
Dries Wuytens is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Jannes Van Hecke with Abdoulaye Sissako. This is the third substitution made today by Francky Dury.
Laurens De Bock for Zulte has been booked by Lothar D'Hondt and receives a first yellow card.
